Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT hs-TnI Cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/Creatine Kinase Or Isoenzymes Test System
Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Specimen Container(s): Lithium heparin tube with plasma separator gel
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT hs-TnI cartridge with i-STAT 1 System for quantitative cardiac troponin I measurement in whole blood and plasma using electrochemical immunoassay technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of cardiac troponin I (cTnI) in whole blood or plasma samples in point of care or clinical laboratory settings to aid in the diagnosis of myocardial infarction (MI).
